column1: Little Goat Diner////Food: The food was the bomb dot com. We started with the bloody mary's ($11) each which were delicious and spicy. For an appetizer
column2: we got the tempura mashed potatoes ($5)
column3: they are a must have if you haven't tried them before. My BF got the corned beef hash
column4: which was flavorful and delicious. The same goes for the braised beef sandwich ($14) I ordered
